title.rendered: Multi Channel eCommerce Analytics with Paul Sonneveld of Merchantspring

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 36:34 — 33.5MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 36:34 — 33.5MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Paul Sonneveld is the co-founder and CEO of Merchantspring. MerchantSpring is the leading analytics and reporting platform for marketplace agencies, aggregators, and professional sellers.

Sign up for a free trial below:

https://www.amazingfba.com/merchantspring

**Get a 50% discount for 3 months by using the code below: 

AMAZING

 

You’ll Learn:

  • The most important metrics to track when you are doing multi-channel eCommerce
  • Some great tools out there to get you on multiple channels
  • How to manage the downside potential of small/medium sized issues
  • Why you should not connect with 3PLs
  • Why you need to have 2-3 types of users
  • The key issues in agency partners
  • How to optimize full profitability of the accounts
  • The time challenges and ways to resolve them
